6194.verse-arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لِإِيلَافِ قُرَيْشٍ
6194.verse-english: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh -

clauses-arabic.clause: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لِإِيلَافِ قُرَيْشٍ

clauses-english.clause: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh -

6195.verse-english: Their accustomed security [in] the caravan of winter and summer -

clauses-english.clause: Their accustomed security [in] the caravan of winter and summer -

6196.verse-english: Let them worship the Lord of this House,

clauses-english.clause: Let them worship the Lord of this House,

6197.verse-arabic: الَّذِي أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَآمَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍ
6197.verse-english: Who has fed them, [saving them] from hunger and made them safe, [saving them] from fear.

clauses-english.clause: [saving them] from hunger and made them safe,
